meanings.definition: The quality of being able to breathe easily.
meanings.sent1: His breathabilities improved after practicing deep breathing exercises.
meanings.sent2: The baby's breathabilities were evident as she slept peacefully.
meanings.sent3: The superhero's secret power was his exceptional breathabilities.
meanings.sent4: In the fresh mountain air, her breathabilities felt limitless.
meanings.sent5: The athlete's remarkable breathabilities amazed the crowd.

meanings.definition: The ability of a material to allow air to pass through it.
meanings.sent1: The fabric's breathabilities made it perfect for summer clothing.
meanings.sent2: Engineers tested the breathabilities of the new ventilation system.
meanings.sent3: The inflatable mattress boasted impressive breathabilities for campers.
meanings.sent4: The windbreaker's breathabilities kept the hiker comfortable on the trail.
meanings.sent5: The breathable mask's breathabilities prevented fogging of glasses.
